thought: To craft a furnace_minecart, I first need to craft a minecart. A minecart needs 5 iron ingots in a T shape. I already have 5 iron ingots in slot 42, so I will move one of them to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 1 with quantity 1
